channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Backup Managed Maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 29, 07:00 UTC  -  Oct 2, 20:00 UTC

Aug 26, 23:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 29/09/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 02/10/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : Backup and restoration will be unavailable during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our team will carry out maintenance on the Veeam Backup Managed service.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 1, 07:00 UTC  -  Sep 4, 16:00 UTC

Aug 26, 20:40 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 01/09/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 04/09/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation. If the host has virtual machines, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [RBX2d][VMware Private Cloud] - Cluster6208 incident notification
item.description:
Aug 30, 12:22 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our VMware Private Cloud offer has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 30/08/2025 09:35 UTC
End time : 30/08/2025 12:20 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a hardware issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Aug 30, 10:03 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our VMware Private Cloud offer on the specific Cluster6208 in RBX2d region.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 30/08/2025 09:35 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Cluster6208 is temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access their data on the specified cluster.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a hardware issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R825A15 Incident notification.
item.description:
Aug 28, 13:34 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the specific rack R825A15 has been resolved.

Start time : 28/08/2025 12:17 UTC
End time : 28/08/2025 13:30 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 28, 13:17 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the specific rack R825A15.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 28/08/2025 12:17 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable in this specific rack.
Customers Impact : Customers cannot acces their hosts in this specific rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by an electrical equipment issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Aug 28, 13:12 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the specific rack R825A15.

Start time : 28/08/2025 12:17 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
